comments.body: Thank you for the issue. In the future, please file these in the TC project where support can attend to them properly.

I tested with my Samsung-SGH-777 with android 2.3.6.

I can reproduce customer'e problem. When you click the label more than twice, the updateRow action become wired, like update wrong rows or update multiple rows together.
